title: BookRepo
description: BookRepo is your complete reading management platform. Discover and organize books, get AI-powered summaries and personalized recommendations, and chat with Merlin, your built-in literary assistant. Everything you need to enhance your reading journey, all in one place.

title: News Authencity Analyser
description: A web interface system to detect fake news, developed using Machine Learning.Implemented Logistic Regression, Random Forest models for accurate predictions.

title: ResBuild
description: A web-based application for creating professional and customizable resumes.

title: Meme-generator
description: A fun little web app where users can click a button to generate random memes, jokes, and riddles.

title: WeatherApp
description: Find your cities weather condition,humidity and windspeed.

title: To-do-App
description: Manage your daily tasks using this simple web application.

title: EmailSpamDetector
description: This app classifies an email or sms as spam or ham. I have used MultinomialNB algorithm to classify emails. Provided a simple and clean streamlit interface .
